name: gy94
title: The Goldman & Yang (1994) model of dN/dS

args.name: omega
args.description: Relative rate of non-synonymous changes relative to synonymous changes

description: This is a version of the gy94 model that has been extended to use user-supplied exchangabilty matrix `submodel` on nucleotides.  The original gy94 model distinguishes only between transitions and transversions, and is equivalent to `gy94_ext(hky85_sym)`.

citation.title: A codon-based model of nucleotide substitution for protein-coding DNA sequences
